question: You will not believe this.  Just as I hit POST on this board and another board to let all of you wonderful people know I did NOT have diabetes - I may have it afterall.  Yes, they called just now and said - well Dr. so and so and his MS nurse reviewed the results themselves and feel that I need to be evaluated and looked into further as a possible diabetic by my regular physician.  Because the numbers were so close to "diabetes" (the GTT numbers) they feel more testing is in order.  But what ON EARTH more could they do?  For cryin outloud my A1c was 5.3, and that is a good number.  So, I made an appointment with my GP for next Thursday. Sorry, just feeling down again now.Thanks.
title: Dr. just called, they are changing their minds possibly (m)..
